statements: SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, time_in, time_out FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 101
SELECT course_name, attendance_date, time_in, time_out FROM student_attendance WHERE course_id = 201 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31'
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC, time_in ASC
SELECT student_name, course_name, time_in, time_out FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' AND time_in BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY time_in
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date, time_in, time_out FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date > '2021-01-01' AND attendance_status = 'Absent' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name, time_in, time_out FROM student_attendance WHERE course_id = 101 AND MONTH(attendance_date) = 6 ORDER BY attendance_date ASC
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_status, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE course_id = 201 AND attendance_status = 'Late' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC, time_in DESC
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, date FROM student_attendance ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, AVG(participation_score) AS average_score FROM participation_data GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, session_id, participation_score FROM participation_data ORDER BY participation_score DESC, session_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, date, attended FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, participation_score FROM student_attendance JOIN participation_data ON student_attendance.student_id = participation_data.student_id;
SELECT date, COUNT(student_id) AS attendance_count FROM student_attendance GROUP BY date;
SELECT student_id, AVG(participation_score) AS avg_score FROM participation_data GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT class_id, AVG(student_id) FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT participation_type, COUNT(*) FROM ParticipationData GROUP BY participation_type;
SELECT * FROM ClassSchedule WHERE start_time >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT class_id, attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 2 AND class_id = 3
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ParticipationData WHERE participation_type = 'Group Discussion'
SELECT student_id, class_id, participation_date FROM ParticipationData ORDER BY participation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor='John Doe';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS courses_taken FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, AVG(participation_grade) AS average_grade FROM participation GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(participation_grade) > 80;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Smith';
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, participation_grade FROM participation WHERE participation_grade > 90 ORDER BY participation_grade DESC;
SELECT first_name || ' ' || last_name AS full_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE length(course_description) > 0;

SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Attendance ON Enrollment.enrollment_id = Attendance.enrollment_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND attended = true;
